Package weloveclouds.server.requests.kvecs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IKVECSRequest
    An executable request which produces the response IKVAdminMessage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CopyDataToDestination
    A data copy request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which copies a range of the data stored on the data access service to a remote location.
    CopyDataToDestination.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating a CopyDataToDestination instance.
    DefaultRequest
    An unrecognized request to the data access layer.
    InitializeKVServer
    An initialization request to the IReplicableDataAccessService, which initializes the service.
    InitializeKVServer.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating a InitializeKVServer instance.
    KVECSRequestFactory
    CommandFactory design pattern, which gives a common handling mechanism of different requests.
    KVECSRequestFactory.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating a KVECSRequestFactory instance.
    LockWriteAccess
    A lock request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which forbids PUT and DELETE requests to be processed.
    MoveDataToDestination
    A data move request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which moves a range of the data stored on the data access service to a remote location.
    MoveDataToDestination.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating a MoveDataToDestination instance.
    RemoveRange
    A remove range request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which removes those entries whose key's hash value is in the specified range.
    ShutdownServer
    Shutdown the Server itself along with every open connection.
    StartDataAcessService
    A start request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which starts the service.
    StopDataAccessService
    A start request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which stops the service.
    UnlockWriteAccess
    An unlock request to the IMovableDataAccessService, which releases the previously activate write lock.
    UpdateRingMetadata
    An update metadata request to the IReplicableDataAccessService, which defines in what range shall be the keys of the entries which are stored on this server.
    UpdateRingMetadata.Builder
    Builder pattern for creating a UpdateRingMetadata instance.
